pkgmetadata.longdescription: Approximate Optimal Experimental Designs Using Generalised Linear Mixed Models // Optimal design analysis algorithms for any study design that can be represented or modelled as a generalised linear mixed model including cluster randomised trials, cohort studies, spatial and temporal epidemiological studies, and split-plot designs. See https://github.com/samuel- watson/glmmrBase/blob/master/README.md for a detailed manual on model specification. A detailed discussion of the methods in this package can be found in Watson, Hemming, and Girling (2023) doi:10.1177/09622802231202379.
